analysis.description:
Reentrancy in EnkronosCrowdsale.finalize (/unique_contracts/0xda3fa12b3d41cd9948db6437f27c0c9978c55cbb.sol#502-511):
	External calls:
	- finalization() (/unique_contracts/0xda3fa12b3d41cd9948db6437f27c0c9978c55cbb.sol#508)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- isFinalized (/unique_contracts/0xda3fa12b3d41cd9948db6437f27c0c9978c55cbb.sol#510-511)

Crowdsale._deliverTokens (/unique_contracts/0xda3fa12b3d41cd9948db6437f27c0c9978c55cbb.sol#254-258) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(_beneficiary,_tokenAmount) (/unique_contracts/0xda3fa12b3d41cd9948db6437f27c0c9978c55cbb.sol#256-257)

EnkronosCrowdsale.finalization (/unique_contracts/0xda3fa12b3d41cd9948db6437f27c0c9978c55cbb.sol#517-525) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-token.transfer(owner,remaining) (/unique_contracts/0xda3fa12b3d41cd9948db6437f27c0c9978c55cbb.sol#522-525)

EnkronosToken.INITIAL_SUPPLY should be constant (/unique_contracts/0xda3fa12b3d41cd9948db6437f27c0c9978c55cbb.sol#142-147)
EnkronosToken.decimals should be constant (/unique_contracts/0xda3fa12b3d41cd9948db6437f27c0c9978c55cbb.sol#141-142)
EnkronosToken.name should be constant (/unique_contracts/0xda3fa12b3d41cd9948db6437f27c0c9978c55cbb.sol#137-140)
EnkronosToken.symbol should be constant (/unique_contracts/0xda3fa12b3d41cd9948db6437f27c0c9978c55cbb.sol#140-141)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_contracts/0xda3fa12b3d41cd9948db6437f27c0c9978c55cbb.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_contracts/0xda3fa12b3d41cd9948db6437f27c0c9978c55cbb.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_owner' of BasicToken.balanceOf (/unique_contracts/0xda3fa12b3d41cd9948db6437f27c0c9978c55cbb.sol#71) is not in mixedCase
